~client
print_requestPrint Request is just an alias for Print GET request.
print_get_requestPrint GET Request sends the request to be generated to the given stream.
print_post_requestPrint POST Request sends the request to be generated to the given stream with post data.
send_requestSend Request is just an alias for Send GET request.
send_get_requestSend GET request explicitly sends a GET.
send_post_requestSend POST Request posts some post data to the server

client

explicit client(
   const std::string &host =  "www.boost.org",
   const std::string &path =  "/",
   const std::string &user_agent =  "Boost.Asio.HttpClient"
) : path(path) , host(host) , user_agent(user_agent) , accept("")

Allows user to set host, path, and user-agent.

Parameters

hostThe hostname to connect to.
pathThe path to request.
user_agentThe User-Agent to claim we are.

~client

virtual ~client()

print_request

bool print_request(std::ostream &stream) const

Print Request is just an alias for Print GET request.

print_get_request

bool print_get_request(std::ostream &stream) const

Print GET Request sends the request to be generated to the given stream.

print_post_request

bool print_post_request(std::ostream &stream,
const std::string &post_data) const

Print POST Request sends the request to be generated to the given stream with post data.

Parameters

streaman output stream
post_datadata to be included in the body of the request
